verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Kneel at the cross,
Leave every care;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Kneel at the cross…
Jesus will meet you there.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
List to His voice,
Leave with Him your care
And begin life a new.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kneel at the cross,
There is room for all
Who would His glory share;
Bliss there awaits,
Harm can ne’er befall
Those who are anchored there.

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
Turn not away
To life’s sparkling cup,
Trust only in His love.
